CaretBlock.Try: By default IDEA completes your code instantly. Start typing Ran right where the caret is, and you will see Lookup Menu of completions. You can choose the first item from Lookup menu by pressing EditorEnter
To activate Basic Completion action press CodeCompletion and you will see lookup menu again.
Press EditorEnter to choose top item from lookup menu.
Press EditorCompleteStatement to complete this statement.
Sometimes you need to find completions for static constants or methods. Press CodeCompletion twice to increase search level of Code Completion.
